Description: Neck and shoulder sherd (mended from two fragments) of East Greek (North Ionian?) pottery oinochoe; exterior: cream slip, fugitive brown paint; one dot-rosette preserved on shoulder, with broad band below and glaze at turn of neck; inscription cut on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXII, no. 9)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 643, no. 11)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.652)
